# my-gen (gen CLI)

> A CLI tool and DSL for project scaffolding, automation, and scripting. Provides a custom language to automate file operations, variable management, shell commands, and conditional logic for Node.js and cross-platform environments.

my-gen (also known as gen) enables developers to define project templates, automate repetitive tasks, and manage project setup using a simple, extensible Domain Specific Language. It supports interactive prompts, file generation, shell execution, and AI-powered code generation. The repository includes the core engine, command documentation, ready-to-use templates, and comprehensive tests.

## Documentation
- [Main README](README.md): Primary project documentation, usage, and DSL overview
- [Agent Guide](AGENTS.md): In-depth guide for agents and AI on creating `.gen` files and using the DSL
- [Hybrid Approach](doc/hybrid-approach.md): Design and rationale for hybrid shell/cross-spawn execution
- [Cross-Spawn Analysis](doc/cross-spawn.md): Technical analysis of cross-spawn integration
- [Command Reference](doc/commands/): Directory with detailed documentation for each DSL command

## Specifications
- [TypeScript Config](tsconfig.json): TypeScript compiler configuration for the project
- [Package Manifest](package.json): Project metadata, dependencies, and scripts

## Templates & Examples
- [Templates Directory](templates/): Ready-to-use `.gen` project templates for various stacks (Node, React, Fastify, Angular, etc.)
- [Test Scripts](test/): Example `.gen` files and test cases demonstrating DSL features and edge cases

## Configuration
- [Global Variables Storage](src/dsl/global.ts): Implementation of persistent global variables
- [Template Manager](src/dsl/templateManager.ts): Template loading and management logic

## Optional
- [Spinner Utility](src/utils/spinner.ts): CLI spinner for progress indication
- [Context Management](src/dsl/context.ts): Execution context and variable management
- [Documentor](src/dsl/documentor.ts): Markdown documentation generator for `.gen` files
